backend/main.mo: Defines core types for photos, videos, events, special moments, and related upload/filter structures, with comparison helpers and blob-storage mixin integration.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping UI/UX enhancement features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for many frontend files, describing their purpose and visual/functional behavior.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template setting SEO metadata, social tags, and loading the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router with all site routes, wraps the app with theming and layout, and records visitors on load.
frontend/src/components/admin/EventManag: Admin interface for creating, editing, deleting, and managing events, including images and password protection.
frontend/src/components/admin/FooterEdit: Form UI to view and update footer contact details and social media links using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersSect: Admin interface for filtering, creating, editing, updating status, and deleting orders with dialogs and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/PhotoUploa: Handles selecting, previewing, validating, and batch‑uploading photos with progress tracking and deletion support.
frontend/src/components/admin/Shortlists: Displays user shortlists grouped by event with stats and an event filter using admin query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/SpecialMom: Manages creation of special moments and uploading images with compression, progress tracking, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserStatis: Computes and shows photo statistics including totals, averages, and top liked photos with a table view.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideoUploa: Handles selecting, previewing, uploading, and deleting videos with progress tracking and UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/VisitorsSe: Displays paginated site visitor records with roles, timestamps, and admin-only access.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessHelpe: Helper UI that guides users through obtaining admin access, showing their principal and copyable commands.
frontend/src/components/EventPasswordPro: Dialog component prompting users to enter a password for protected events with validation and error display.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, contact info, and social icons using fetched footer content.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the main site header with navigation, authentication controls, and an optional admin link.
frontend/src/components/PhotoActions.tsx: Provides like and download buttons for a photo, handling auth checks, state, and blob download logic.
frontend/src/components/PhotosViewer.tsx: Full-screen photo viewer with ESC-to-close, image display, details, and actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Prompts authenticated users without profiles to create one and saves the profile data.
frontend/src/components/RouterNotFoundRe: Redirects certain unknown photo-detail routes to /photos and shows a fallback not-found page.
frontend/src/components/SEOHead.tsx: Applies page-specific SEO metadata by updating meta tags on mount.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login state, identity loading, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend features like user profiles, admin checks, photos, videos, events, and orders.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, custom color themes, typography, scrollbars, and utility classes for UI effects.
frontend/src/lib/blob-utils.ts: Provides helpers to convert ExternalBlob to URLs or bytes, convert images to JPEG, and download single or multiple images with memory-efficient processing.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Defines SEO config defaults and functions to update meta, Open Graph, Twitter, and canonical tags dynamically.
frontend/src/lib/time-utils.ts: Converts between HTML date strings and backend nanosecond timestamps and formats them for display.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin panel page controlling access via authentication and admin checks, rendering various management sections with tab navigation.
frontend/src/pages/BusinessInfoPage.tsx: Displays business information, services list, and social/contact details with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetailPage.tsx: Shows an event’s details and gallery, loading images from blobs and providing a lightbox viewer.
frontend/src/pages/EventPage.tsx: Displays event details with authentication, password protection, image actions, and shortlist/download controls.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Lists all events with sorting and authentication gating, showing a login prompt when unauthorized.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a favorites page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, services overview, and navigation to gallery and contact.
frontend/src/pages/MediaGroupPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a media group page.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoDetailPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a photo detail page.
frontend/src/pages/PhotosPage.tsx: Displays photo gallery with sorting, lightbox viewer, and error/loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a portfolio page.
frontend/src/pages/RobotsPage.tsx: Renders and displays robots.txt content dynamically in the browser.
frontend/src/pages/SitemapPage.tsx: Generates and displays sitemap.xml content directly in the browser.
frontend/src/pages/SpecialMomentPage.tsx: Shows a special moment's images with individual and batch download features.
frontend/src/pages/SpecialMomentsPage.ts: Displays a sortable gallery of special moments with loading, error, and empty states using themed UI components.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Shows a sortable video gallery with authentication gating, loading states, and a modal for video playback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters with hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, shadows, and container settings for a custom themed UI.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, and pending requests for a UI styling update initiative.
